News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge vs. Worthing
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge vs. Worthing
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge vs. Worthing
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Buildbase FA Trophy fixture against Worthing on Saturday.
News.description:
The Daggers enter the Buildbase FA Trophy following an impressive away win last week against promotion rivals Dover.

The Daggers opponents Worthing currently sit 16th in the Ryman Premier League. Worthing beat Hemel Hempstead in a fourth qualifying replay to set up the tie.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Dover 1-2 Daggers
Daggers 0-1 Torquay United
Daggers 1-4 Barrow
Maidstone 0-1 Daggers
York 0-2 Daggers

Worthing
Worthing 2-2 Billericay Town
Hemel Hempstead Town 0-1 Worthing (FA Trophy)
Worthing 1-1 Hemel Hempstead Town (FA Trophy)
Worthing 1-2 Havant & Waterlooville
Dulwich Hamlet 4-1 Worthing

Team News
The Daggers will be without a number of players for Saturday. Okenabirhie, Robson, Williams, Howell, Pennell, Ling and Robinson are all set to miss out. Hawkins may be available.

Previous Meetings
This will be the first competitive fixture between the two teams.

Fixtures
There is a full list of FA Trophy fixtures this Saturday. All 3:00pm KOâ€™s. A full fixture list can be found here.

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website
